name: Gene the Squirrel
description: Casual video game for the iPhone. The design of the video game was seven months. Knut LSG Hybinette is the main Program Artist, dealing with the specifics of physics, special effects and input interactions. Megan Ehrhart is the Co-Designer, Animator, 3D Layout Artist, and Color Corrector for various splatters of the game. An upcoming update of the game will have 2D AR (Augmented Reality) capabilities.
